text: ellam mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam malak shadid alqwt, dhu manzar hsn, wahu jbryl ealayh alslam, aldhy zahar wastwa ealaa suratih alhaqiqiat llrswl salaa allah ealayh wasalam fi al'ufuq alaela, wahu 'ufuq alshams eind mtleha, thuma dana jbryl min alrasul salaa allah ealayh wslm, fzad fi alqrb, fakan dnwwuh miqdar qawsayn 'aw 'aqrab min dhalik. fawha allah subhanah wteala 'iilaa eabdah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam ma awha bwastt jbryl ealayh alsalam. ma kadhab qalb muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam ma rah bsrh
